heading: HB00033
0: AN ACT MANDATING THE LABELLING OF PLASTIC PRODUCTS ACCORDING TO THE TYPE OF PLASTIC RESIN USED IN SUCH PRODUCTS, PROVIDING PENALTIES FOR VIOLATIONS THEREOF AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
short-title: Mandating The Labelling Of Plastic Products According To The Type Of Plastic Resin Used In Such Products, Providing Penalties For Violations Thereof
status: Pending with the Committee on ECOLOGY since 2019-07-23
